content.body: hacknorris: if the DTD is in the external subset and you have a non-validating UA then it won't read the DTD. You need to have the default value declarations at least in the internal subset. But also, why are you using DTDs at all?
content.formatted_body: hacknorris: if the DTD is in the external subset and you have a non-validating UA then it won't read the DTD. You need to have the default value declarations at least in the internal subset. But also, why are you using DTDs at all?
